short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clock with two configurable alarms that will play a sound and speak a phrase of your choice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set an Alarm for your own customization time with customized voices to provide best service to user set a reminder to do some special work for them.
